subject: HISTORY
text: To what extent were the landed classes the most important part of feudal society?

text: The most important role of the church in medieval society was religious. How valid is this view?

text: To what extent did Charles I’s policies in Scotland meet with success up to 1642?

text: The bourgeoisie benefited the most from the French Revolution. How valid is this view?

text: By 1850 there had been a significant growth in German nationalism. How valid is this view?

text: To what extent did the Nazis stay in power due to the popularity of their social policies, 1933−1939?

text: To what extent was the Civil Rights movement effective in meeting the needs of black Americans, up to 1968?

text: To what extent was the British policy of appeasement the main reason for the aggressive nature of the foreign policies of Germany and Italy in the 1930s?

text: To what extent was the role of Ronald Reagan the main reason why the Cold War ended?
